source.name: Expected New Nuclear Power Plant Applications
source.description: A catalog of new nuclear power plant applications that the NRC expects to receive during each calendar year. This catalog shows the applicant's name, project or docket number, reactor design type, dates on which the NRC received and accepted the application, proposed number of units, name and State of the proposed site location, whether the site currently has an operating unit, and the current status of the application. The information for future applications is based solely on letters of intent submitted by prospective applicants.
